aboutSection.aboutMe: Hi! My name is Hanqi Hao, recently graduated from post-graduate program. I mainly focus on frontend development for website and mobile. And also I have one year work experience with blockchain technology.

workSection.workDes: I have a strong passion for design and new technology. I mainly focus on Frontend Development for Website and Mobile App. But I also have a good knowledge with Backend, understanding REST api, JWT.

workSkill.workSkillDes: Having a solid skill with HTML, CSS and JS. Comfortable with using RESTful API and GraphQL
Familiar with React, Redux​ (also middleware such as ​redux thunk​).
Understanding BDD​,​TDD​ way to test and develop code.
Familiar with Adobe XD design tool.
Familiar with Desktop and Mobile design
Having a solid skill to achieve Animation
Understanding ​Client requirements and Strong communication Skills
Familiar with React Native and Swift UI.
Having a strong skill with React-Navigation​
Able to develop Cross Platform App

skillSection.skillDes: I use number of tools and library to make development much easier. I usually use Adobe XD to do wireframes, mock up for website and mobile app. React and React Native is my favourite frontend framework which I use daily. Ant Design is my favourite UI library, in my projects there are a lot of UI come from it.
